data.title: Watch the First Trailer for Pitch Perfect 3, Starring Anna Kendrick
data.meta_description: The movie musical reunites the Barden Bellas for a farewell tour.
data.text:
Take a look above at the first trailer for Pitch Perfect 3, which stars Tony Award nominee Anna Kendrick.

The movie musical follows the Barden Bellas, a collegiate all-girl a cappella group. The girls are out of college and find themselves split apart. A sudden opportunity in Europe brings them back together in a performance to support the troupes.

The film follows the 2012 original feature and the first sequel, released in 2015. The two movies featured Dear Evan Hansen Tony winner Ben Platt and Spring Awakening's Skylar Astin.
